attributes.action: Help close shops and supermarkets during bank holidays at christmas
attributes.additional_details: It has become more and more apparant that during these past few years that shops and supermarkets are open more during the christmas period this year Asda opened on boxing day and new years day and as a result morrisons is to follow suit in 2012. managers are working over 60 hours a week for no extra pay as they are on salary and overtime is not given to general staff when they can have management do the extra work for free...unions are no longer a force to fight for the well fare of the employee and businesses know it thus they continue to take advantage...ask yourself do you really need to go shopping on boxing day or new years day ?? these members have a family as well which during christmas they hardly ever see this surely cannot be right please please help stop this now before its too late and it gets worse
